I even use a bit on my eyelids and this has improved the texture on that delicate skin.<br /><br />What I really like about Valentia is that it smells lovely and it's not watery, soaking into my skin immediately. It easily and quickly absorbed into my skin, leaving it feeling fresh and well-nourished. After a few days of twice-daily usage, a definite improvement in my previously uneven skin tone was quite obvious! There was no residue left behind and no greasy/oily feeling-something I've noticed with other serums. It's suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin, because it absorbs so quickly and does not contain artificial irritants that would impact any skin type.   109. My wife has been using this product for several months now, and I've noticed how much this has helped. It doesn't take long to start seeing results. It really does what it claims. It is a great product too. It’s a good idea to keep it refrigerated. This will keep the serum from oxidizing too quickly, and will give you a better result for the price. Below is how my wife uses hers, I think she read this online somewhere.<br /><br />Correct method of application will definitely increase the effectiveness of the cream.<br /><br />1) Dampen your face with water and start by applying the serum to your face and neck.<br /><br />2) Let it dry for some time and then apply a moisturizer, if possible use one with a sunscreen in it. It is important that you use the serum before moisturizing and not after. This is because the serum is easily absorbed into the skin, while moisturizers work on the surface. If you use the moisturizer first, your skin will not be able to absorb the vitamin c serum.<br /><br />For the money you cannot beat the results. The claims of a facelift in a bottle are actually true. Valentia Skin Care supplied a sample to evaluate, test and review.

  155. Everyday our skin is effected by all of the elements we endure. Most women my age (in our mid thirties) start to worry about signs of aging. Do you look at your self in the mirror and think &#34;oh wow I think those are crows feet forming around the edges of my eyes and are those wrinkles forming around my smile&#34;??? But that doesn't mean we can't slow things down a bit!<br /><br />All the women before me in my family have tried many things over the years to pause or slow down the effects of aging but none of them had ever really found anything that really worked. I myself have tried a few different types of remedies and or creams but never really found anything that seemed to do the trick, but recently I began using this intriguing product called Valentia Even Glow Serum. I purchased this product from Amazon.<br /><br />Now I am not one who buys into serums and things as such since I am truly a non-believer when it comes to miracle creams etc but when I read the product description it made me think. All natural ingredients such as Vitamin C, Green Tea Extract, Organic Rose hip Seed Oil, Organic Sea Buckthorn Oil, and Resistem (plant stem cells). So I bet you're thinking what the heck do all these ingredients do and does it really work???? Well let me break it down for you so it makes more sense: Vitamin C is a great source for boosting your immune system as well as tightening the skin and making it smooth. Green Tea Extract acts like an anti-inflammatory and helps to rid your skin of irritants. Rose hip & Sea Buckthorn oils promote skin hydration and locks in moisture plus they are both full of antioxidants. Resistem helps to promote detoxification and works to regenerate your skin faster while protecting it from environmental stresses.<br /><br />Together all these ingredients work to help even your skin tone, increase the radiance and glow, absorb moisture better, reduce wrinkles & fine lines, and boost collagen production.<br /><br />My favorite part of this product is that it is made with natural and organic cosmetic ingredients.<br /><br />I have been using Even Glow Serum for a little over two weeks and I have to admit I was sort of upset at one point because my face started to break out a bit about a week and a half into using it. This is totally normal since my face hasn't had this much papering in awhile. The reason I broke out was all the toxins in my skin started to come out which led to blemishes, but once my face was cleared out and thoroughly cleansed my face began to brighten up. I really do feel the difference. Just washing with a good cleanser and moisturizing is not enough.<br /><br />I cleanse my face, pat dry, and then I apply the serum to my face and neck areas every night before I go to bed. I awake to a softer, more radiant, moisturized face. My skin feels tight and the small wrinkles I did see forming before have all seemed to be smoothed away as if they never existed.<br /><br />If I had to give this product stars I would give it a 4.5. Seeing the difference of what my skin looked like before I tried the Serum and comparing to what I look like now isn't drastic but the more I use it the better my skin feels and the better it looks.<br /><br />Lets face it we women really do worry about our looks so why not start taking extra care of them? I like to have a little extra bounce and kick to my step how about you? Feel confident in knowing that you are taking the best care of your skin you can with Valentia Even Glow Serum.<br /><br />Befly tested and befly approved!

  207. The Vitamin C Serum contains 98% naturally derived ingredients and 72% organic ingredients. I would like to see the amount of organic ingredients be closer to 100%. Most of the ingredients have low to no toxicity based on EWG's Skin Deep Database. The Vitamin C Serum contains one ingredient that does pose toxicity to the body: Phenoxyethanol (4). Since the Vitamin C Serum contains water, a preservative is needed for shelf life. Otherwise, you would need to use the product within 1-2 weeks and a lot of it would go to waste.<br /><br />I used the Vitamin C Serum for 2 weeks without any other product applied to the face (not even a moisturizer). My skin has wrinkles, dry spots, and red spots.<br /><br />My Results: Skin feels hydrated, softer and more moisturized without using an actual moisturizer. Wrinkles have smoothed out a little. Red spots have reduced in color. I love the smell of fresh oranges. The smell goes away after a couple of minutes.<br /><br />Overall, I experienced good results after using Valencia Even Glow Vitamin C Serum for 2 weeks. I can use the Vitamin C Serum as a preventative measure to reduce future sun damage and wrinkles. Nothing super major, but annoying. By about the third day that I used the serum, I noticed they were very noticeably faded. Another 2 days and my face was smoother and the breakouts were gone!<br />This past Sunday, I was outside working on a project and my face got sun burned! I was worried that the serum would burn or sting, but I took my shower and applied it as I had been. No burning or stinging!<br />The only effects I have when applying the serum is my skin gets red. It doesn't hurt and it only lasts a few moments. I have been applying the serum after I shower and have cleansed my skin so my face is already splotchy red from the warm water and the cleaning. After applying the serum, it is red all over, but again, it goes away quickly.<br />It doesn't take a lot for each application. The lid is a bulb dropper and I typically squirt out a line on my index finger from the second line almost to the tip. I then press my two index fingers together and begin smoothing it over my face beginning from my forehead and working my way down over my face and neck. I usually use 2 lines to do my entire face and neck.<br />I am very happy with the results I have seen. My face feels smoother to the touch, my complexion has evened out, those annoying blemishes are gone(!), the fine lines have smoothed and what is really wonderful is the good feeling doesn't fade away. My skin feels good all day. It doesn't get all dry and cracky feeling and it doesn't turn into an oil slick either! I simply love this serum and what it has done for my skin.<br /><br />UPDATE: I have been using this for an extended time now and I am still very much in love with it! At this point I was using a small amount morning and night so I decided to apply it only at night to see if that would make a difference... still breaking out! So currently I'm applying a very small amount every 2-3 nights and I'll update this review in a couple weeks if I notice that this prevents the breakouts. I'd really like to keep this stuff because the ingredient list is impressive and it does seem to make my skin glow a little bit, but if I continue to break out using it only a couple times a week I'm definitely returning! I'd definitely give it a try if you don't currently have any acne problems.

The ingredients for this product are clearly marked on the box as well: Proprietary Organic Skin Tea, Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf (Aloe), Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Methlsulfonylmethane (MSM), Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide (botanical hyaluronic acid), Globularia Cordifolia Callus Culture Extract (plant stem cells), Organic Rosa Canina (Rosehip Seed Oil), Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel), Citrus Paradisi (Pink Grapefruit Essential Oil), Carbomer, (2s)-2-Amino-5-guanidinopentanoic Acid, d-Alpha Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Algae Extract, Camelia Oleifera (Japanese Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Seabuckthorn Oil), Phenoxyethanol, Ethyl Hexyl Glycerin You just need a few drops of this serum, which is a thicker serum in the color of an orange creamsicle, which is due to the Organic Sea Buckthorn Oil, and it smells like freshly squeezed orange juice - already I am loving the scent! The scent is natural from the ingredients as there is no added perfume to this product. The serum is quickly absorbed into my skin and I have been using it on my cheeks and forehead, where I have some sun damage that I would like to correct and even out. I also use it on my jaw-line, neck and decollete as I would like to increase the collagen in that area, so that I can increase the elasticity and also prevent sagging around my jaw line and neck. I am using it twice a day with no adverse effects since I received this last week. I am avoiding my oily-T zone for now as it is summer time, and I break out just by thinking about pimples.   276. As my skin is beginning to mature, I have begun to notice fine lines and a more uneven skin tone beginning to appear. I have looked for products that will help reverse those signs of aging. Of the products and serums I have tried, Valentia's Even Glow Serum is my favorite. Valentia's Even Glow Serum is meant to repair, refresh and renew your skin, restoring evenness to your complexion. It's primary ingredients, Sea Buckthorn Oil and Rosehip Seed Oil, are great for locking in moisture and promoting skin hydration. Having had a positive experience with both in the past, I was eager to see how well they work when combined with the Vitamin C. Our skin is so easily damaged and so many of take for granted that if we cleanse and moisturize that we are doing a good job. That is only part of a healthy skin care regimen. With all the environmental pollutants and the chemical laden cosmetics we use, the abuse may unknowingly heap upon the delicate skin of our face, neck and decollete can be great. The proprietary blend of skin nourishing super oils in the Even Glow Serum compliments the 20% base of Vitamin C, offering a powerful antioxidant treatment that completes any good skin care routine. Even Glow Serum helps to even skin tone by vanquishing skin discolorations and dark spots. It reduces wrinkles and fine lines with the help of the 20% Vitamin C and skin plumping effects of the Sea Buckthorn oil, while the Organic Rosehip Seed oil increases collagen production so that your skin retains its elasticity. Additional ingredients like Resistem (plant stem cells), Hyaluronic Acid (botanical) and Green Tea all round out their proprietary blend and help to protect your skin against stress-related aging, promote skin detoxification, moisture retention and provide a potent antioxidant that lends to the overall anti-inflammatory benefits of the serum. Living in Florida, I am prone to sweating at the slightest hint of humidity. Heavy skin care products sit on the top of my skin, increasing my body's need to sweat and leave me ready for a shower. I was pleasantly surprised at how light the vitamin c serum was on my skin - despite the ever present heat and humidity of this climate. The serum once on, with or without a moisturizer, left my skin immediately feeling softer and healthier. The orange serum went on smoothly and has a very pleasant citrus scent that seemed to invigorate me - something I now look forward to each morning. It absorbed quickly, was neither sticky or greasy and never left my skin feeling dried out or oily. After several uses, I began to notice a more even appearance in skin tone. After a few weeks of use, I am happy to say that the skin on my face, neck and decollete are indeed softer, seem more hydrated, and is more even in tone. I am looking forward to seeing what extended use of the Even Glow Serum does for those fine lines that have begun to appear in recent years. Overall, I really like this product above other serums I have tried and will continue to use it. I have had no side effects, irritation or breakouts. I imagine extended use, in addition to healthy eating, drinking enough water and the rest of a healthy skin care routine will only continue to provide positive benefits.

Disclosure: I got this product as part of an advertorial, regardless these are my honest thoughts & Experiences.<br />I have been so fortunate lately as I try out Valentia Skin Care's Vitamin C Serum, called Even Glow Serum, for this review, I love to fight aging vitamin C serum. And this product being 20 percent, is pure perfection in it's dosage for the skin (for Vitamin C skincare products to be effective the percentage must be at least 10%).<br /><br />Valentia's Vitamin C Serum is 98% Natural, 75% Organic and MADE IN USA and Made for ALL SKIN TYPES!<br /><br />What are the supporting ingredients in Valentia's Vitamin C Serum? Here are some Quotes from Valentia:<br /><br /> KEY INGREDIENTS<br /><br /> Vitamin C: With a 20% concentration does more than boost the body’s immune system; it also provides many benefits to keep the skin tight, smooth and looking ageless. Vitamin C has been scientifically proven to reduces the effects of sun exposure on the skin, including sunburn, sun spots, redness and wrinkles.<br /><br /> In addition to helping reduce the signs of aging, Vitamin C is essential for everyday maintenance to strengthen and smooth out the skin, as well as neutralizing free radicals before they can damage the skin.<br /><br /> ***Our additional Key Ingredients below were all selected for their ability to enhance and support Vitamin C's effect on the skin.<br /><br /> Organic Rosehip Seed Oil & Organic Sea Buckthorn Oil - These oils promote skin hydration and lock in moisture to protect your skin from signs of aging and improve its beauty and youthfulness. Rosehip Oil specifically has been used in medical communities around the world for those with serious skin ailments and only recently has North America learned to embrace natural solutions from our ancestors. These two organic oils are full of antioxidants and therefore act as the perfect supporting cast for our best friend - Vitamin C<br /><br /> Resistem (Plant Stem Cells) - This provides the perfect mix of protection from stress-related aging and promotes skin detoxification. Resistem will help your skin regenerate faster while protecting it from environmental stressors.<br /><br /> Hyaluronic Acid (Botanical) - Holding up to 1000 times its weight in water and drawing moisture out of the environment and onto the surface of your skin ,there is not a more effective moisturizing agent on the market today. Penetrates deeply, and actives collagen production for a fresher, younger, firmer, and brighter complexion<br /><br /> Green Tea Extact- The catechins in green tea are a potent antioxidant which also contribute to the overall anti-inflammatory and anti-irritant benefits of this ancient health and beauty secret.<br /><br />I love the stabilized Vitamin C Serums in the dropper bottles like this, using the dropper you can easily control the amount applied to the skin. And being the Vitamin C Serum from Valentia Skin Care is at 20% you know it's going to help the collagen in your skin by not only supporting it but helping to build it.<br /><br />As we age, our Collagen in the skin weaken and it takes a formula of 10% or higher to support and increase your collagen production, which helps with Anti-Aging skincare regime.<br /><br />Vitamin C not only supports the Collagen, but it helps brighten up the skin as it helps get rid of that nasty ol' skin discolorations (call them what you may, liver spots, age spots, sun spots etc). Vitamin C is a great antioxidant. With Vitamin C you can expect to see tightening, smoothing and softening of your fine lines and wrinkles. AND Vitamin C helps your skin better absorb your moisturizers. This is why Vitamin C is known as one of the BEST Anti-Aging products out there.<br />How to use this Vitamin C serum:<br />Be careful not to let your Vitamin C Serum be exposed to Sunlight or Air as even in a stabilized formula, like Valentia's Vitamin C, there are vulnerabilities. Here are the cautions you should take to treat the product well:<br /><br /> When using the eye dropper, don't squeeze the bulb while in the bottle, as this will add air to the product. Instead squeeze the bulb then place in the bottle to suck up the product.<br /> As always with anything that is applied to the skin, try not to touch the product, nor the applicator (in this case the eyedropper) to you skin. This will help keep the product pure and no worries of contamination<br /> Keep this bottle closed tightly and close it as soon as you can, this will help to further prevent air exposure.<br /> Keep the bottle out of sunlight, direct or indirect... instead keep it in a cool, dark place.<br /><br />Using the Vitamin C Serum on your Skin:<br /><br /> Wash your face and leave the skin damp<br /> Valentia recommends you shake the bottle, I recommend (to avoid incorporating too much air) that you treat the bottle gently to mix the product. And just like us Cosmetologists and Manicurists were taught, place the bottle between your palms and roll for a minute or two. If you are in a hurry and the gentle technique for mixing is too time consuming for you, don't let it scare you from using the product, go ahead and shake as Valentia recommends, it's just my personal preference in keeping the products strength.<br /> Use the dropper and drop the Vitamin C Serum onto your Facial Fingers... your facial fingers are the best fingers to use whenever you touch your face, it's the middle finger and the finger next to your pinky finger.<br /> Gently apply the product to your face, neck and even your decollete (the upper part of your chest area).<br /> Let the product dry completely on your skin before you apply your moisturizer and makeup.<br /><br />Now I have used this product, but not long enough to tell you what it does deep down inside my skin or tell you much about what it does to the surface of the skin... although I can say that it has helped reduce the appearance of my pores (remember that nothing truly reduces the size of your pores, but it can clean them out and make the appearance less noticeable).<br /><br />Cons:<br /><br />This Vitamin C Serum isn't in separate single use capsules. Why would I prefer that? Because Vitamin C needs to be handled with great care, avoid exposure to air as much as possible.<br /><br />Pros:<br /><br />The Cost! Most of us wouldn't be able to purchase the capsules with Vitamin C serum as the cost goes way up and you can (as long as your careful) get the same satisfaction with the dropper bottles for much less. The prices on Vitamin C Serums over 10% tend to be in the $70 to $200 range and when I picked up mine (At Amazon) it only cost $35! It's on sale now, what a true bargain!<br /><br />At 20% Vitamin C, this serum is stronger than most on the market.<br /><br />I thank Valentia for entrusting me with this review, I love your product with the scent and what I've seen, so far, with my skin. Even my sensitive skin handled well with your product, no breakouts, no rawness and I love the way my moisturizers soak into my skin.<br /><br />I received one or more of the products mentioned above for free using Tomoson.com. Regardless, I only recommend products or services I use personally and believe will be good for my readers.ght or Air as even in a stabilized formula, like Valentia's Vitamin C, there are vulnerabilities.   324. According to the Valentia site, this serum will &#34;repair, refresh and renew your skin, restoring evenness to your complexion, giving you an extra boost of confidence each time you look in the mirror.&#34; I am generally skeptical of such claims, but this serum has been a pleasant surprise. It has made my face softer and smoother, and has helped to remove the dark circles under my eyes.<br /><br />Let's take a look at the ingredients in the serum:<br /> Sea Buckthorn Oil and Rosehip Seed Oil –These oils work in tandem to promote skin hydration and then lock in moisture. When combined with Vitamin C, all three ingredients exist harmoniously to combat free radicals, protecting your skin from future signs of aging to prmote more beautiful, youthful looking skin.<br /><br />Resistem (Plant Stem Cells)– Protects against stress-related aging while promoting skin detoxification. A French study has demonstrated that Resistem improves dullness of the skin 67% when applied in comparison to a placebo, also reducing skin inflammation by 23% after just two short months. This means that your skin will regenerate more quickly as it is protected against environmental stressors in a gentle, sensitive manner.<br /><br />Hyaluronic Acid (Botanical) – Allows your skin to retain more moisture than before while simultaneously increasing elasticity and firmness. The Journal of Clinical Aesthetic Dermatology conducted a study with 15 female volunteers ages 35 to 65 to demonstrate the effects of Hyaluronic Acid. After only two short months of use, all 15 volunteers showed demonstrated improvement in skin rejuvenation.<br /><br />Green Tea: The catechins contained in green tea are a potent antioxidant which also contribute to the overall anti-inflammrtory, and anti-irritant benefits of this ancient health and beauty secret.<br /><br />And here are the benefits their website extols:<br />EVENS SKIN TONE: Vanquish dark spots and skin discoloration, replacing uneven and ill-textured skin with smooth, wrinkle-free skin that leaves you looking flawless and ageless.<br /><br />INCREASES GLOW & RADIANCE: Revitalize your skin with essential fatty acids that leave skin smooth and radiant. Smooth skin capable of reflecting light will give your skin a youthful glow and a brilliant shine for that well-rested and refreshed look.<br /><br />ABSORBS RAPIDLY: Moisturizes skin due to the capacity of the hyaluronic acid to absorb water, thereby increasing fluid between cells, giving your skin a smoother and younger appearance. This intense water absorption means no more dry, peeling or cracked skin, even in extreme weather.<br /><br />BOOST COLLAGEN PRODUCTION: The presence of Organic Rosehip Seed oil increases collagen production so your skin retains the elasticity responsible for a youthful appearance and prevents skin sagging associated with aging. Enjoy smooth and supple skin that takes years off your appearance.<br /><br />REDUCES WRINKLES & FINE LINES: Reduce the visibility of fine lines and wrinkles with the help of our foundation 20 % Vitamin C. When I opened the bottle, the first thing I noticed was the strong citrus scent. The scent does not linger once the serum goes on, however. The serum is a creamy consistency, and has a light orange color. It feels a bit sticky as it goes on, but it is absorbed quickly and does not leave any stickiness on your face. The first time I used it, I noticed a bit of redness afterwards, but consequent uses revealed no such effect. With winter coming on, it's good to know I have something to help my face not to show the ravages of wind and cold.<br /><br />The product can be purchased here on Amazon.com, where it is currently being offered at a reduced price. This scent, though, is very soft and, once the serum is applied, it rapidly fades away.<br />The serum is thick and creamy. It takes only four small drops to cover my entire face and throat, so the bottle will last quite some time. After application, my skin is left feeling silky smooth.   346. I reviewed this product for my blog at AccordingtoMarium. wordpress. com. My experience with this product has been exceptional. I used it twice as a day as directed, everyday for about a month and now that the bottle is almost empty, i can say that the results have been satisfactory, however not as great as the manufacturer had claimed. The first time i used this product i fell in love with its smell. Its like smelling freshly shaved orange peel... very raw and organic. You can tell this product is all natural. The consistency is that of a lotion and it absorbs pretty quickly into the skin leaving it a tad bit shiny and tightened. I had to apply more moisturizer than i usually do in order to make my skin ready for make up. Make sure to keep lots of powder ready because even though this serum absorbs quickly, it leaves a sheen on top of your skin and if you sweat it can ruin your base. Keep blotting papers handy in case you run into a situation like that. Moving on, i started seeing a decrease in breakouts surprisingly early. Id say from about the third day of using it. The existing acne started drying up fast and eventually shed off during exfoliation. My pores seemed smaller and for a while after i started using the serum, i couldnt have been happier with it. But.. soon my skin started to get really dry especially around my T-zone and became rough. I had to reduce my use of and started only to apply it every other day which seemed to fix the problem. I saw no improvement in wrinkle reduction however, and though my skin is fairly clearer and better in texture, i definitely would be wary of using it every day or under makeup.

I have decided to start reviewing the products I use because I feel it’s important to let others know how their money is going to be spent. So, let me tell you of my experience with this product because I know I am not the only one with this problem.<br /><br />First off, this product is only $35.00! Be still my swooning heart! I’m already in love so I decided to try it.<br />Second, I love the packaging. I know that doesn’t do anything for my skin but I can’t help it. I like the simple design with easy to read directions. Your skin is not the only thing that changes after forty ladies!<br />Third, I looked at the ingredients and found that many of them were things I had actually heard of and knew what they were supposed to do! Sometimes, I won’t try a product because I can’t even pronounce the words, much less try and figure out what they are going to do to my skin! The ingredients that the product contains are (as listed by the company):<br /><br />KEY INGREDIENTS<br />Organic Rosehip Seed Oil & Organic Sea Buckthorn Oil<br /><br />These oils promote skin hydration and lock in moisture to protect your skin from signs of aging and improve its beauty and youthfulness. Rosehip Oil has specifically been used in medical communities around the world for those with serious skin aliments and only recently has North America learned to embrace natural alternatives from our ancestors. These 2 organic oils are full of antioxidants, therefore, acting as the perfect supporting cast for our best friend – Vitamin C.<br />Resistem (Plant Stem Cells)<br />This provides the perfect mix of protection from stress-related aging and promotes skin detoxification. Resistem will help your skin regenerate faster while protecting it from valentia skin careenvironmental stressors.<br />Hyaluronic Acid (Botanical)<br />Holding up to 1000 times its weight in water and drawing moisture out of the environment and onto the surface of your skin, there is not a more effective moisturizing agent on the market today. It penetrates deeply and activates collagen production for a fresher, younger, firmer, and brighter complexion.<br />Green Tea Extract<br />The catechins in green tea are a potent antioxidant which also contribute to the overall anti-inflammatory and anti-irritant benefits of this ancient health and beauty secret.<br />How Do You Use This Product<br />Now I am going to explain how I used this product so I’m not doing it differently than anyone else. I washed my face with my cleanser and patted it dry. I then shook the bottle and dropped the product onto my cheeks, forehead, and neck. The products smells delicious (like oranges) and, when I put it on, it glided like silk. There was no burning or tingling, which is always a plus! It rubbed into my skin just fine and I was able to use those few drops to cover my face and neck. So far so good, right? The product says you can put moisturizer on after using it but I wanted to be able to know if it worked without the moisturizer.<br /><br />When I woke up the next day, my skin was still soft! I have these lovely areas of dry skin on each side of my face beside my nose. I know, TMI, but it’s important that I tell you that so you can appreciate the fact that those areas were soft! I was thrilled! Even at the end of the day, my skin was still soft. I still have all of my wrinkles but the description does say it helps those gradually. I have hope! After all, I’ve only been using it for a few days at this time. I have noticed that my sensitive skin has not erupted in pimples or a rash as it has after using other products. I guess they mean it when they say it’s safe for sensitive skin. I have noticed that there is a slight improvement in the skin under my eyes. It doesn’t look like I’ve gone a week without sleep anymore. That is surprising for me because I’ve always had those dark bags under my eyes. I’m excited about this development! Glowing complexion? Well, I haven’t noticed that yet either but I honestly think that would be something someone else would notice first. The only people I’ve been around since starting to use this product are my family and they wouldn’t notice if I dyed my hair purple. I will be going back to work tomorrow so we shall see. If I get any compliments, I will let you know.<br /><br />The Company’s Reminder:<br />“With continued use of the Even Glow Serum you will see better results, from the softening of your skin, fading of fine lines and wrinkles and the evening of your skin tone. Our Vitamin C Antioxidant Treatment takes a bit of time to remove toxins and refresh your skin so don’t be discouraged if you don’t see immediate results (although do not be surprised if your skin feels smoother within the first couple of days).”<br /><br />My Final Decision<br />I give this product 5 stars and definitely recommend! You will feel pampered and delicious and you are worth it!<br /><br />I do hope this review helps other women make an informed decision about purchasing this product. With the thousands of products out there for our skin, all making claims that we will be transformed, it’s important to know when your money is spent well or if it’s another bottle that gets added to the under the sink pile, only to be thrown away later. So far so good and I do plan on continuing to use this product because I like the results and isn’t that what matters?

Your results may vary from mine.<br /><br />Valentia Even Glow Serum comes in a glass dropper bottle and all you do is give it little shake and then place a couple of drops onto your clean, dry face and neck. Then rub it in. Let it dry and then you can apply your regular moisturizer, if needed. It is a medium consistency with a yellowish tint. I didn't notice much of a fragrance. It says it is a citrus scent but to me it's sort of a light, soapy/lotion-y scent. Nothing overpowering by any means.<br /><br />The serum isn't sticky like you'd initially think either. Looking at it in the photo below it looks like it would be. It only takes a small amount and it absorbed quickly with a light rub. I noticed, almost instantly, that is made my skin really soft and hydrated feeling. Along with using it daily on my face, I also tried a little on the tops of my hands, so I could show you what it looks like, and the dry skin instantly vanished and it stayed hydrated for several hours. I, personally, didn't have any redness or itching. I put it on and forgot about it, going on with the rest of my day.<br /><br />I haven't noticed a huge difference, yet, in the reduction of fine lines but I do notice that my face is a lot brighter, my skintone is more even compared to the spotty redness I typically have and my face and neck are extremely soft and hydrated. Upon first receiving the product I was using it twice a day (morning and night) under my normal moisturizer after cleaning my face. I was not changing my skincare routine in any other way to ensure that any results were due to this product. For about 2-3 months prior I had not had any major break outs aside from the occasional hormonal pimple. After about 3 days of using this product I noticed that I was having some issues with break outs. This really concerned me until I read that it can happen when using Vitamin C serums as they draw out the toxins and for some people it takes time to adjust to the nutrients in the product. In an e-mail sent by Valentia about this very issue it was suggested to lower the times a day the serum is used and work you way up to twice a day. So I took that advice and began using the product just once at night and the break outs cleared up, which is currently how I am still using this product. I am 21 and did not have any major wrinkles before incorporating this product into my skincare routine however I have noticed a difference in some of the fine lines I have ... we lovingly refer to as smile lines here. Overall for me this serum has just revived my skin... stress and life are just starting to wear on me and I could see it in my skin but this has given me some of my youthful glow back.

So I put some on my hand. It appears milky when you first use it but it is easily and quickly absorbed into the skin. It also did feel sticky for a minute or two but that stopped and my hand felt like silk. Guess what-even with my extremely sensitive skin-no itching-no redness. So onto my face it went. I took their advice and dotted it on my face then smoothed it in. I immediately felt the difference-the parts of my face that were dry-weren't and my whole face felt oh so smooth! I've only been using this for about a week and it will take longer then that to repair or diminish the discoloration-but I am patient. At least my face isn't itching or turning red from using this product! They tell me it is going to be a cold, hard winter--this serum may just save my poor old face!! Instead of bright white, this one is thick, had a yellow tint and smelled like an orange orchard.<br /><br />Feel- I didn't find it to be sticky or greasy and it felt light on my face. I love the orange scent, the glow {not greasy glow} and the consistency and feel of the serum itself. After several weeks of testing, I'm pleased to share that Valentia Even Glow Serum exceeded my expectations!<br /><br />For the past few weeks, I tested the Valentia Even Glow Serum by applying the product to my freshly washed face (using my regular cleansing products) once a day at bedtime - without moisturizer - over a period of a few weeks so I could see if I noticed a difference in the appearance and texture of my skin.<br /><br />I then stopped using the product for a week and went back to my normal skincare routine to see if I noticed a difference once I stopped using the product.<br /><br />The results are now in and here's what I can tell you about Valentia Even Glow Vitamin C Serum, based on my experience:<br /><br />* When you open your bottle of Valentia Even Glow Serum, you'll be greeted by the light but pleasant scent of fresh oranges. Although I normally avoid fragrance in my skincare products, I absolutely loved the natural scent of this product! When I apply the serum, I feel like I'm getting an aromatherapeutic boost! The scent fades as the product absorbs into your skin so don't worry - you won't go around smelling like oranges all day!<br /><br />* The serum comes with an eye drop applicator that lets you easily apply and control the amount of product you use - but I ended up just using the serum that was on the side of the applicator when I pulled it out of the bottle.<br /><br />* Since I'd never used a serum before, I was concerned that it might be oily or greasy - but this wasn't the case at all! The Valentia Even Glow Serum quickly absorbs into your skin, leaving it feeling fresh, nourished and moisturized.<br /><br />* During the testing period, I could see a noticeable difference in the tone and quality of my skin! My skin definitely began to glow again and my skin tone improved. My skin definitely looked and felt healthier!<br /><br />* Most significantly - when I stopped using Valentia Even Glow Serum - I stopped seeing results! Within a few days, I could feel the dryness returning and see the glow fading.<br /><br />I used to believe that all of those skin care ads were hype but truly, Valentia Even Glow Serum worked wonders on my skin!<br /><br />I look forward to re-ordering more before my current bottle runs out!easy - but this wasn't the case at all!   506. Now, I will be honest. I did not have a serum as a consistent piece of my skincare routine. When I would receive samples in my Birchbox I would use them up and then carry on with my life. The idea behind a serum is to get the nutrients deeper into your skin. A moisturizer hydrates the top layer of your skin and makes a protective barrier. So after figuring all this out, I realized how the order of skin care should go: cleanse, tone, serum, moisturize, spf. Got it.<br /><br /> But why this particular serum, you may ask. What are the benefits? There are so many out there, how do I know what they will do and why should I care and/or spend more of my hard earned money on something else? Or maybe it's just me asking these questions.<br /><br /> The Even Glow Serum contains organic rosehip seed oil and organic sea buckthorn oil; along with plant stem cells and green tea extract. Why is that good? Well the oils lock in moisture to help protect your skin from aging. I definitely want that, I am aging regardless but if my skin could keep some of it's good looks while I'm doing it that would be great. The plant stem cells also help with aging effects and promotes skin detoxification. It also helps your skin regenerate faster, while also protecting it from environmental factors. All of that seems legit to me, I don't want toxins from the environment hanging in my pores and the layers of my skin. Lastly, green tea extract has lots of antioxidants (all of these ingredients do) and which helps with inflammation and irritants. These are all good things, for sure. This serum is full of antioxidants and chocked full of nutrients to help your skin get a nice even glow; hence the name.<br /><br /> So, the first time I used this, I was kind of confused because it comes in like a dropper. Do you know how hard it is to fill up a dropper with a liquid and then disperse it across your face? It's surprisingly complicated. But I just dripped it across my forehead and checks then rubbed in with my hands. A little goes a long way, definitely. It's kind of an orange color, and it smells like orange juice which is nice. Once it soaks in, which is does quickly, you can go about your regular skin care routine. It's just that easy. Just remember to give the jar a nice little shake before you apply because, like the ingredients, separation is natural.<br /><br /> Valentia recommends only using this serum once a day because of the high boost in nutrients, and they don't want your skin to become overwhelmed - so I have been sticking to that rule and have not noticed a problem in the 7 days I have been using this product. I also have noticed that my skin is not as dry, the skin tone is more even and my face is definitely softer.

  566. I know that there are many choices out there for skin serums, but I’d like to direct your attention to Valentia’s Even Glow Serum, because not only is it effective and affordable, it’s also unbelievably fragrant, delightfully easy to use, and just amazing all around.<br /><br />Too often, I try out a new product and immediately cringe in slight revulsion at the scent, because most of the time, I’m given a bottle with a label that boasts a great fragrance but in actuality just smells like something from a chemistry lab, but I was glad to see that this serum offers none of that. I don’t know about you, but when I think of Vitamin C, my mind brings up images of oranges, and so it was a natural, pleasant surprise to me that the serum presented itself with a great citrus scent (don’t be alarmed by the orange color of the serum; the concoction is made with Organic Sea Buckthorn Oil, which is a nutrient-rich ingredient that turns most formulations orange). It also conveniently absorbs into the skin rapidly. It’s suggested that you can use this daily – once in the morning and/or once at night, depending on your skincare habits – and I must say that when I wake up in the morning, my skin feels extremely soft from the serum, and even though it’s still a little too early to see obvious results, I know that I’m on my way to a more even and radiant skin tone. In addition, the following can be expected from regular use of the serum: 1) boosted collagen production; 2) reduction of wrinkles and fine lines; 3) fewer occasions of dry, peeling, or cracked skin, even in extreme weather. Of course, there’s no such thing as a cure-all magic beauty bottle, so one still must see this serum as a supplement to other necessary methods of promoting healthy skin, such as drinking plenty of water, getting ample rest each night, avoiding drinking/smoking/drug habits, and protection from UV rays (please avoid skipping over sunscreen!).<br /><br />I also want to take a minute to point out the packaging and appearance of the bottle, simply because I believe in the power of aesthetics. If someone was presented with two identical products with the singular difference that one was packaged more beautifully and luxuriously than the other, which product do you think that person will choose? Valentia is one of those companies that take aesthetics importantly. The product may not be as prominent and expensive as La Mer or Kiehl’s, but the beautiful white box with the gold trimmings and eye-friendly text makes up for its new stature in the industry and looks professional and reliable, and the glass bottle itself doesn’t disappoint either!<br /><br />After all that talk, I don’t want to give off the impression that I’m hyping this product up because I’m obligated to. I’m only sharing what I’ve discovered and thoroughly enjoy using. I’ve been using this every day ever since I received it, and I do love Valentia’s Even Glow Serum because it really is different from other serums I’ve used (that citrus scent trumps everything else!) and already shows great potential in giving my skin a softer and more radiant look, and like I said earlier, it’s never too early to start protecting your skin from unavoidable harmful exposure and the inevitable aging process.

  611. As I've gotten older, I have become much more conscious about what I put in and on my body. I read labels and all the available information I can about a product before I decide to use it. For anti-aging products I look for that fine line between all natural and organic and those that deliver scientific results.<br />Valentia Vitamin C Serum meets all my requirements and then some! The back of the box list the organic and botanical ingredients and what purpose they serve:<br /><br />Organic Rosehip Seed Oil & Organic Sea Buckthorn Oil<br /><br />These oils promote skin hydration and lock in moisture to protect your skin from signs of aging and improve its beauty and youthfulness. Rosehip Oil has specifically been used in medical communities around the world for those with serious skin aliments and only recently has North America learned to embrace natural alternatives from our ancestors. These 2 organic oils are full of antioxidants, therefore, acting as the perfect supporting cast for our best friend - Vitamin C.<br /><br />Resistem (Plant Stem Cells)<br /><br />This provides the perfect mix of protection from stress-related aging and promotes skin detoxification. Resistem will help your skin regenerate faster while protecting it from environmental stressors.<br /><br />Hyaluronic Acid (Botanical)<br /><br />Holding up to 1000 times its weight in water and drawing moisture out of the environment and onto the surface of your skin, there is not a more effective moisturizing agent on the market today. It penetrates deeply and activates collagen production for a fresher, younger, firmer, and brighter complexion.<br /><br />Green Tea Extract<br /><br />The catechins in green tea are a potent antioxidant which also contribute to the overall anti-inflammatory and anti-irritant benefits of this ancient health and beauty secret.<br /><br />The serum comes in a brown glass bottle with a stopper. Since chemical binding agents are not used, it is recommended that you lightly shake it. The serum has a slightly opaque orange-ish color with a soft citrus scent. It has a slight cooling effect as you apply it to your skin. It spreads easily and only a small amount is required. I applied in it in small dots over my face and neck and then blended it in. It is absorbed easily and once fully absorbed you can apply your moisturizer.<br /><br />I have been using this product now for 4 weeks, I use it once in the evening. This Vitamin C Serum is great as it is just the right consistency to apply in the morning. It's not too thick and not too runny. It is light enough even to wear under my makeup. I will continue to use this C Serum as I am very happy with it.<br /><br />Disclaimer: I was provided a complimentary sample. All opinions are my own.
